content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Furnace at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Furnace (position x1)

### Coal Mine at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Burner mining drill (position x2)

### Iron Plate Factory at position (x)
Consists of the following entities:
- Assembling machine (position x3)
- Inserter (position x4) that puts into the assembling machine
- Beltgroup (position x5) that connects the furnace at position x1 to the assembling machine at position x3

### ERROR TIPS

### Errors when crafting due to insufficient ingredients
- Ensure that you have enough of the required ingredients in your inventory before attempting to craft items. For example, crafting an iron gear wheel requires 2 iron plates, which must be available.

### Errors when extracting from a furnace
- Make sure the furnace has items to extract before attempting to extract. If the furnace is empty, the extraction will fail.

### Errors when placing items into a furnace or other entities
- Ensure that the target entity (like a furnace) is not already occupied or has space for the items you are trying to place. 

### Errors when inspecting furnace inventory
- If you receive an empty inventory response, verify that the furnace is operational and has items to inspect. 

### General Tips
- Regularly check your inventory to ensure you have the necessary materials for crafting and construction.
- Familiarize yourself with the recipes and requirements for crafting items to avoid running into ingredient shortages.
